convertFourBytesToInt

public static int convertFourBytesToInt(byte[] bytes,
                                        int index)
Converts the four following bytes in the array 'bytes' starting from the index 'index' into the corresponding integer

Parameters:
bytes - the byte array from where to take the 4 bytes to be converted to an integer
index - the starting index on the interested portion to convert
Returns:
the converted integer

convertTwoBytesToInt

public static int convertTwoBytesToInt(byte[] bytes,
                                       int index)
Converts the two following bytes in the array 'bytes' starting from the index 'index' into the corresponding integer

Parameters:
bytes - the byte array from where to take the 2 bytes to be converted to an integer
index - the starting index on the interested portion to convert
Returns:
the converted integer
